name: Rockhopper (James Muirhead)
description:
Rockhopper is a simple retro style arcade game where you dodge asteroids in your little pink spaceship, and see how far you can go! 

Made in under 48 hours!

Controls: 

Mouse - Moves the spaceship

...yeah its a pretty simple game

Music Attribution:
